column1: Table 8.5: All India Index Numbers of Area of Principal Crops
Note: (1) Data for Foodgrain, Oilseed and Commercial Crops are as per Fourth Advance Estimate for 2015-16.
(2) Data for Horticulture crops are as per Final Estimate for 2014-15 and 3rd Advance Estimate for 2015-16 released by Horticulture Division, DAC&FW.
